Dear All,
Weâ€™re excited to invite you to an upcoming team outing on Saturday, November 23rd, 2024! Join us at SeaWorld Abu Dhabi for a day of adventure, relaxation, and team bonding. This outing will be a great opportunity for us all to connect, have fun, and make unforgettable memories together.
Outing Details:

*	Date: Saturday, November 23rd, 2024
*	
	Location: SeaWorld Abu Dhabi
*	Lunch: Provided within SeaWorld

To make the day even more special, weâ€™ve organized three experience options for you:

1.	Option 1: SeaWorld and Louvre Abu Dhabi
2.	Option 2: SeaWorld and Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque
3.	Option 3: SeaWorld only

Please RSVP by 1st of November 2024 and indicate your preferred option for the day. This will help us finalize all arrangements and make sure everyone enjoys the outing.
Weâ€™re looking forward to a wonderful day with the team! Letâ€™s relax, explore, and make the most of our time together.

Best regards,
